label: uKSortCodeId
comment: The unique United Kingdom (UK) Sort Code identifier as assigned by the UK Payment Association (APACS) for this creditor financial institution.
The unique United Kingdom (UK) Sort Code identifier as assigned by the UK Payment Association (APACS) for this debtor financial institution.

domainIncludes.comment: A bank, building society, credit union, stock brokerage, or similar business of the party that receives money.
A bank, building society, credit union, stock brokerage, or similar business of the party that owes money.
